attributes.action: call on the BBC to revoke the decision to make Catherine Tate the next Doctor Who companion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doctor Who is a British institution. Saturday evenings behind the sofa following the Time Lord's adventures through time and space are part of this nation's fabric. Doctor Who is also a great export generating millions of pounds of revenue.

To put this treasure at risk is irresponsible. But the BBC have done just that by making Catherine Tate as Donna Noble the next companion.

This decision needs to be reconsidered and revoked to protect this cultural gem.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
